channel.title: Comments on: Opencoffee Limerick – Auctomatic chat on ustream

item.title: By: James Corbett
item.dc:creator: James Corbett
item.description: Thanks but I've got to say it wasn't just the people in the AbsoluteHotel.com who made today such a great experience, it was also the interaction we had from remote viewers through twitter, jaiku and in the Ustream chat room. It was a wonderful occasion.
item.content:encoded: Thanks but I’ve got to say it wasn’t just the people in the AbsoluteHotel.com who made today such a great experience, it was also the interaction we had from remote viewers through twitter, jaiku and in the Ustream chat room. It was a wonderful occasion.
